instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the pluperfect and perfect verbs.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each pluperfect or perfect verb you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose the pluperfect or perfect from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct verb form in either the perfect or plusquamperfect. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
